Name: Heating hot Water Piping - Small Diameter Threaded Steel - (2.5 inches in diameter or less), SDC D, E, or F (OSHPD or sim), BRACING FRAGILITY

GeneralInformation.Description: Heating water.  Costing based upon 1000 ft segments of pipe, pipe 2.5 inches in diameter or less
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: Consequence is for piping only.  Enter floor wetting consequence seperately.  Cost includes allowance for MEP relocation to perform work.

DamageStates.Description: Isolated support failure w/o leakage - 0.5 supports fail per 1000 feet of pipe (assuming supports every 20 feet).
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace failed supports.  One repair per 1000 LF.
